page.title: 05EDUCATION:ALLESTREE/QUARNDON
page.content: STATE EDUCATION IN THE AREA,CONTROLLED FROM MATLOCK,IS BASED ON THE TWO-TIER SYSTEM:{PRIMARY SCHOOLS 5-11 YEARS}AND {COMPREHENSIVE SECONDARY SCHOOLS 11-18 {YEARS.}THERE IS NO SELECTION BY ABILITY. IN QUARNDON,PRIMARY PUPILS ATTEND THE {CURZON}SCHOOL(82 ON ROLL) WHICH IS AN ANGLICAN VOLUNTARY AIDED SCHOOL.IN THE ALLESTREE AREA THERE ARE TWO PRIMARY SCHOOLS:{PORTWAY AND {QUARN PARK}(484 AND 61) {WOODLANDS}SCHOOL (SEE PHOTO B)SERVES THE SECONDARY FUNCTION IN THE AREA,PROVIDING EDUCATION TO UNIVERSITY ENTRANCE.THE NUMBER ON ROLL IS 1273,WHICH WITH A STAFF OF 76 INCLUDING HEAD AND DEPUTIES (42 WOMEN AND 34 MEN) GIVES A PUPIL-TEACHER RATIO OF 16.7:1, COMPARED WITH A COUNTY AVERAGE OF 18.5:1.
